item.title:
英国的资本利得主要集中在小规模的富裕地区，这表明大多数选民不会受到提高利润税的影响。
研究显示，伦敦一个地区获得的收益比利物浦、曼彻斯特和纽卡斯尔获得的收益总和还要多：
item.description:
Capital gains in the UK are concentrated in small, wealthy areas, suggesting most voters would not be hit by higher taxes on the profits.

More gains were received in one part of London than in Liverpool, Manchester and Newcastle combined, research showed: on.ft.com/42HPRNz

item.title: 巴克莱银行宣布了一项在未来三年内向股东返还 100 亿英镑并控制成本的计划，该银行正试图重振萎靡不振的股价。
item.description: Barclays has announced a plan to return £10bn to shareholders over the next three years and rein in costs as the bank attempts to revive its languishing share price on.ft.com/3T61Z7U
